plot: Octogenarian Elsie finds herself at the center of a round of miracle vaccines. We meet her as she struggles to grasp what is actually going on, and watch as events unfold out of her control.
title: The Living and the Dying
plot_es: Octogenarian Elsie finds herself at the center of a round of miracle vaccines. We meet her as she struggles to grasp what is actually going on, and watch as events unfold out of her control.
plot_en: Octogenarian Elsie finds herself at the center of a round of miracle vaccines. We meet her as she struggles to grasp what is actually going on, and watch as events unfold out of her control.
